entity

Class ABContactContact

  • entity.ABContactContact
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ABLinkable, Bean, CommonContactContact, Validatable, Versionable

    public class ABContactContact
implements Bean, CommonContactContact, Validatable, ABLinkable, Versionable
    The purpose of this table is to avoid a self-referencing foreign key on abcontact, and to allow contacts to relate to one another in different ways.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Integer BeanVersion
      Auto-incremented object version
      Key ID
      Internally managed primary key
      String LinkID
      Represents the ID used by client applications to link with the Address Book.
      Long LoadCommandID
      LoadCommand for load where row was created. If not null this object was loaded via the loader.
      String PublicID
      ID or primary key of the row in the external system to which this row is mapped
      ContactRel Rel
      Role
      ABContact RelABContact
      Second contact in the relationship.
      ABContact SrcABContact
      First contact in the relationship.
